trans-unit.source: Represents a member of a type using a literal code fragment.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用原义代码片段的类型的成员。

trans-unit.source: CodeSnippetTypeMember can represent a member of a type using a literal code fragment that is included directly in the source without modification.
trans-unit.target: CodeSnippetTypeMember 可以表示使用直接包含在源而无需修改原义代码片段的类型的成员。

trans-unit.source: This code can be included in the type declaration.
trans-unit.target: 此代码可以包含在类型声明。

trans-unit.source: A CodeSnippetTypeMember stores a section of code, exactly in its original format, as a string.
trans-unit.target: CodeSnippetTypeMember 将一段代码，完全按照其原始格式，存储为一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: The CodeDOM does not translate literal code fragments.
trans-unit.target: CodeDOM 不会转换原义代码片段。

trans-unit.source: Literal code fragments are stored and output in their original format.
trans-unit.target: 存储和在其原始格式输出文本的代码片段。

trans-unit.source: CodeDOM objects that contain literal code are provided so developers can encapsulate code that is already in the target language.
trans-unit.target: 提供了包含文本的代码的 codeDOM 对象，以便开发人员可以封装已在目标语言的代码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember.Text%2A> property contains the literal code for the type member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember.Text%2A>属性的类型成员包含文本的代码。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember"></xref> class using the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeSnippetTypeMember"></xref>类使用指定的文本。

trans-unit.source: The literal code fragment for the type member.
Gets or sets the literal code fragment for the type member.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置类型成员的代码片段。

trans-unit.source: The literal code fragment for the type member.
